title: MBMBaM 590: Keep Your Grades Up
description:
Big news, folks, we’ve partnered with Mariah Carey. That’s right, she'll be ​bringing you one segment an episode for the rest of the year! We’ve got bits and goofs that pair perfectly with the hit holiday jam.

Suggested talking points: Niftys, Boner Lisa, Touch the Eyeball, Dr Crankenstein’s Monster, Pizza Shaq, Cheeseburger Sleeve, Going up to Santa’s House

Asian Pacific Environmental Network: https://apen4ej.org/ 

Harmony House: https://harmonyhousewv.com/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
